text_content: This is to certify John Doe has completed an internship at Google.

CID : ST/INP/10568 Dear KAR:IVEERA YYA, We are pleased to welcome you to our organization's PYTHON PROGRAMMING Internship Program. SYSTEMTRON is monitoring this internship as a chance for you to learn. Your Training/Internship starts on 06/10/2025 and ends on 02/11/2025. It's 04 Week.s program. It's also an Unpaid program all focus is on learning. We anticipate a fruitful and dependable partnership that will prepare you for future endeavors. I wish you the very best in your internship program, one that is both entertaining and truly rewarding. Best Regards, -Founder System Tron www.systemtron.in
